definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
to put up/to build (scaffolding)/to hang (clothes on a pole)/to connect/to join/to arrange in pairs/to match/to add/to throw in (resources)/to take (boat, train)/variant of 褡[da1]

sentences.english: Now I wondered if it was all for naught.
sentences.chinese: 现在我则怀疑所有这些是否白搭。

sentences.english: It's no use trying to buck the system.
sentences.chinese: 企图反抗这种制度是白搭的。

sentences.english: Copying other people's inventions have a "white car" interests.
sentences.chinese: 仿制别人的发明成果具有一种“白搭车”的利益。

sentences.english: It's no use arguing with him.
The house was built with all my savings, but now it went down the drain.
sentences.chinese: 那房子花了我所有的积蓄，现在全都白搭了。

sentences.english: But he never liked to use cigarettes, he said they were too gentle and wasted money.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他从来不吸烟卷，他说那烟没有劲，白搭钱。

definition: needless to say/it goes without saying
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
as before/(same) as usual/in the same manner/still/nevertheless
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
